original: Cederbom, Carl Olof (Olle), rektor, Mellerud, f. 6/8/04 i Skara av lärov:-adj. Seth C. o. Eva Lindblom. G. 36 m. Annie Pettersson, d. 38. Barn: Lars f. 38. — Stud:ex. i Skara 23, fil. mag. i Upps. 28, provår i Gbg 35. Tjg. i Klippan 29, Skara 30, Karlsborgs komm. mellansk. 30-32, Gbgs dito 32-34, Gbgs h. real 35-37, adj. i Karlshamn 37, ord. ämneslär. o. rektor v Medleruds komm. mellansk. 40, adj. o. rektor v. Melleruds samrealsk. sed. 45. Folkberedsk. länsomb. i Dalsland 41-45, ordf. i Dalslands bildn:förb. 42-44 samt i Skidfrämj. lokalkomm., v. ordf. i folksk :styr., led. av komm:-fullm.
translated: Cederbom, Carl Olof (Olle), principal, Mellerud, b. 6/8/04 in Skara to teacher-adj. Seth C. and Eva Lindblom. Married in 1936 to Annie Pettersson, who passed away in 1938. Children: Lars b. 1938. - Passed student exam in Skara in 1923, earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from Uppsala University in 1928, had a trial year in Gothenburg in 1935. Worked in Klippan in 1929, Skara in 1930, Karlsborgs municipality junior high school between 1930 and 1932, Gothenburg's municipal junior high school between 1932 and 1934, Gothenburg's upper secondary school between 1935 and 1937, was a teacher in Karlshamn in 1937, and became an ordinary subject teacher and principal in Melleruds municipality junior high school in 1940, and an adjutant and principal in Mellerud's coeducational secondary school since 1945. People's preparedness county representative in Dalsland between 1941 and 1945, chairman of Dalslands bildn: förb. from 1942 to 1944, and of the Skidfrämj. local committee, vice-chairman of the public school board, member of the municipal council.
